item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Nicki Minaj - For All The Barbz [Direct Website Rip]
item.description:
Nicki Minaj - For All The Barbz​


Nicki's website put out an exclusive stream of her song "For All The Barbz". The song was hosted by Ustudio, and had quite the protection. Through yt-dlp's referring tool and ffmpeg's codec correcting tool, here's the direct rip.

While poking around, I found that the original file name for the file that was put up for stream was "All The parties NM_4.mp3". So this is technically lossy, but was converted to FLAC to prevent more quality degradation.

Here's the generation for transparency: MP3 > WEB > MP4 [mismatched MPEG-TS/AAC stream] > MP4 [corrected audio stream] > AAC > WAV > FLAC.

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: infurtile
